snippet.title: Inside Stories from the Craig Wright Trial
snippet.description:
Recap of everything Bitcoin for Nov, 30th 2021
► Craig Wright, the man who claimed to be Satoshi Nakamoto, is waiting a civil suit. The trial is going to Florida Jury, could award as much as $198B. Join us discussing the inside of the CSW trial - what is the point of the law suite? 

► During the senate testimony on the economy - Fed Chair Jerome Powell says it is now time to retire the word transitory on describing inflation. That tells us they are in trouble. Yellen continues to create false narratives. Steve Hanke says inflation is here and admits that inflation tax is stealing more than wages. 

✔ Check our our special guest:
► https://twitter.com/fractalencrypt?s=11

✔ Get your Bitcoin 2022 Conference Tickets Now for 10% OFF
► Use Promo Code: SIMPLYBITCOIN
► http://tixr.com/pr/SIMPLYBITCOIN/26217

✔ Daily Fail Sources:
► https://twitter.com/business/status/1465728790055862274?s=28
►https://www.thornburg.com/insight-commentary/global-perspectives/market-insights/federal-reserve-sees-a-transitory-rise-in-inflation/

✔ Epic Memes:
► https://twitter.com/RD_btc/status/1465643952040775689?s=20
► https://twitter.com/_benkaufman/status/1465430277568741379?s=28
► https://twitter.com/icoffenderii/status/1460566838828576769?s=28

✔ BTC News:
► https://twitter.com/steve_hanke/status/1464731465283821569?s=28
►https://blockworks.co/craig-wright-trial-goes-to-florida-jury-which-could-award-as-much-as-189b/

✔ btcpayserver v1.3.6:
► https://github.com/btcpayserver/btcpayserver/releases/tag/v1.3.6

✔ Check out our Sponsors, support Bitcoin ONLY Businesses:

✔ Crypto Cloaks:
► For all of your 3D printed  needs: Bitcoin Node Cases, Lightning Network Code Cases, BTC keychains, coasters, 3D Printed Honey Badgers, wallet mounts and a whole lot more !
►http://www.cryptocloaks.com?afmc=2h&utm_campaign=2h&utm_source=leaddyno&utm_medium=affiliate

✔ Citadel21: ► https://www.citadel21.com
► A Bitcoin cultural zine. Bitcoin culture is rich and varied. It contains a multitude of voices, opinions and flavors. Together they form what is seemingly chaos, but with an abundance of signal. Citadel21 aims to curate this chaos and put some of the best, coolest and weirdest pieces of raw signal on display. Get the latest copy of Citadel 21 while supplies last only 1000 of each volume are made. 
► https://www.citadel21.com

✔ Amber App: ► https://amber.app
► Bitcoin made easy. Amber is the easiest way to invest in Bitcoin. Make instant purchases or set up a recurring investment from as little as $5 a month.
► https://amber.app

✔ CypherSafe:► https://cyphersafe.io
► When you’ve decided to be your own bank and hold your bitcoin yourself, it’s time to create a physical backup to protect those keys and your bitcoin. CypherSafe offers a full line of physical stainless steel products to help you protect your bitcoin from various modes of failure. 
► https://cyphersafe.io

✔ Join our Telegram, Give us Memes to Review!
► https://t.me/TheSimplyBitcoinChannel

✔ Follow Us!
► https://twitter.com/SimplyBitcoinTV
► https://twitter.com/BITVOLT7
► https://twitter.com/Coinicarus

✔ Special Thanks to these Awesome Bitcoiners: 
► https://bitcoin.clarkmoody.com/dashboard/
► https://t.me/nobullshitbitcoin
► https://twitter.com/DocumentingBTC

✔ Descriptions & Thumbnails by, Meg:
► https://twitter.com/btcmeg

► We are a proud supporter of Bitcoin only businesses.

DISCLAIMER: All views in this episode are our own and DO NOT reflect the views of any of our guests or sponsors.

0:00 - Intro
0:18 - BTC Stats
4:30  - Daily Fail
24:33 - Meme Review
28:35 - BTC News
54:17 - Software Release
